attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The route of this crime is mainly traced to under age persons and the access to cheap alcohol. i believe that by increasing the cost of alcohol by at least double, cutting the amount of time pubs and clubs can open and cutting special offers on already cheap booze may elivate the probelms on society today.First offenders should be given a fixed penalty ticket for £200 in order that they think about there actions. Repeat offenders should be given stiffer penalties. There should be a reduction in the amount of paperwork the police service undertake in order that more police officers can provide patrols on the streets offering reassurance to the public and that a zero torrelance approach be made to all crime.
